revised_title: Process of Making Sea-Salt by the Sun in France
tldr: This article describes the process of making sea-salt by the sun in France. It explains the method of salt-making in salt marshes, the importance of the sun and wind for salt production, and the factors affecting the salt's color and quality. The author also discusses the tools and techniques used in salt-making and the differences between salt made by the sun and salt made by fire.
